title: Smart Doors & Windows
description: The Smart Doors and Windows is a blueprint pack designed to provide dynamic and interactive doors and windows systems for your projects!
longDescription:
DEMO | DOCUMENTATION
Smart Doors

The Smart Doors feature in this package offers a highly customizable and interactive system for creating doors in your Unreal Engine projects. It includes a custom frame and door mesh, individual door components and collisions and an adjustable hinge angle for realistic door movement.

The doors also have an adjustable animation for opening and closing, and a fast opening on hit feature for dynamic interactions. The system also includes an easy interaction system and a lockable state for added functionality.


Smart Windows

The Smart Windows feature provides a similar level of customization and interactivity for window systems.

Like the Smart Doors, the windows have individual components and collision, adjustable animations, and an easy interaction system.

The windows also have an easy interaction system and a lockable state for added realism and functionality.


Update 2.0
  • Animated Handles
  • Changeable meshes and materials
  • Added hinges generation
  • Added windowsills generation
  • Scalable Components (Transform parameters)


Use Cases

The Smart Doors & Windows package is ideal for a variety of use cases. Whether you’re creating a residential building, a commercial structure, or a fantasy castle, these smart systems can add a level of realism and interactivity that enhances the user experience.


The package also includes 4 collision responses for interaction, allowing you to customize how the doors and windows react to different types of collisions. You can also specify custom ignored actors and components, giving you even more control over how your doors and windows function.


Finally, the package includes a development preview feature, allowing you to test and refine your door and window systems before finalizing your project.


Demo level included

The demo level includes examples of all features of the Smart Doors & Windows Blueprints, each with interactive examples and use cases! (Disclaimer: Quality level 3+ enables Lumen)
technicalDetails:
Smart Doors & Windows - Technical Information
  • Custom frame and mesh
  • Custom Animated Handles
  • Individual components and collision
  • Adjustable hinge angle
  • Adjustable Animation
  • Fast opening on hit
  • Easy interaction system
  • Lockable state
  • 4 collision responses for interaction
  • Custom ignored actors and components
  • Development preview


Number of Blueprints: 4 Doors & Windows, 1 Interface, 5 Demo

Input: Keyboard and Mouse

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac

Documentation: Smart Doors & Windows | UE5 Documentation

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Added controls widget and manual control event for BPI_Interact
